thread.title: PES University Admission 2026 Open: Apply Now @pes.edu
thread.title_full: PES University Admission 2026 Open: Apply Now @pes.edu

author: Viraaj Vashishth
title: PES University Admission 2026 Open: Apply Now @pes.edu
text:
PES University Bangalore has opened admissions for the 2026-27 academic year, with course-wise fee details available.
PES University, a private university in Bangalore, began its admission process for the 2026-27 academic year. The university also published fee structures for its UG and PG programmes. Candidates wishing to secure a spot in one of its programmes, such as B.Tech, MBA, B.Des, etc., must complete their application by 31st January 2026.
For detailed information on courses and rankings, Check PES University Admission and Fee Details
What programs are offered by PES University?
PES University will be accepting admissions to a number of UG, PG, and PHD programs for the academic year 2026. The programs will include B.Tech, MBA, and M.Tech, and various other UG and PG programs. Below is the table for all the programs and their eligibility:
Course | Eligibility |
---|---|
|
MBAM.TechMCABCABBAB.Sc in NursingPh.DB.DesB.Sc {Hons.}How to Apply for PES University Admission 2026?
Students may apply online through the link given below and register through the online application using a valid email ID and filling out the application form. Applicants are required to fill in their academic records they have and submit entrance exam results like JEE Main or KCET for B.Tech or UCEED for B.Des. The deadline to apply is January 31st, 2026.
